  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120300</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120300</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Lepenje pri vodoravni palici</string>
            <string language="en">Static Friction on a Horizontal stick</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Statische Friktion auf einem horizontalen Stock</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Frottement statique sur un bâton horizontal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fricção de estática em uma vara horizontal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrito statico su un bastone orizzontale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στατική τριβή σε ένα οριζόντιο ραβδί</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fricción estática en un palillo horizontal</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Leseno palico pritiskaš vodoravno proti zidu, tako da je v ravnovesju.</string>
            <string language="en">Wooden stick is pushed horizontally against the wall in such a way that equilibrium holds.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">lepenje</string>
            <string language="en">static friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">statika</string>
            <string language="en">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hölzerner Stock wird horizontal gegen die Wand 
gedrückt, so daß Gleichgewicht anhält.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le bâton en bois est poussé horizontalement 
contre le mur de telle manière que l'équilibre se tienne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A vara de madeira é empurrada horizontalmente de
encontro à parede de tal maneira que o equilíbrio prende.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il bastone di legno è spinto orizzontalmente 
contro la parete im modo tale che l'equilibrio tiene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ξύλινο ραβδί ωθείται οριζόντια ενάντια στον τοίχο
κατά τέτοιο τρόπο ώστε η ισορροπία κρατά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El palillo de madera se empuja horizontalmente 
contra la pared de una manera tal que el equilibrio sostenga.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">statische Friktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">frottement statique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fricção de estática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attrito statico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στατική τριβή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
